td.content: s:23 year old female student presents with moderate hyperesthesia in lower limbs, severe weight loss. she has history of moderate parethesia in lower limbs. she has approx. a 30 pack/year history of smoking describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 2 years in her past o:Height 62 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15, rectal exam = normal, no masses found, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OU:20/100, normal pupillary reflex, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, appropriate speech, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, Extremities = B/L 2+ pitting edema throughout a:Type 1 Diabetes p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to endocrinology.
